title: Road to Pre-Season: Gameplay Systems Update

replies.body: {{champion:104}} You sure you aren't adding anything else?
But Graves vapes now

{{champion:33}} 
#OK
lmao who isn't still mad about that
Something I don't like is bothering me. Enough time has passed, I guess it magically isn't bothering me anymore.
Has Rito gone vegan or something? First {{champion:427}} and now plants? GIVE US BACK OUR MEAT!
The name checks out.
I mean, I don't eat salad much, maybe I'll main jungle and have less of a canabalistic mid lane diet. But with no ageis, adcs will be more delicious than ever :-\ choices.

Victorious mao, Ivern, Jungle Plants, No zyra nerfs

What are you trying to imply riot?
Go green ...

mom always said I was big for my age ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

Size doesn't matter! {{champion:17}} 

{{champion:1}}  ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

Implying either "love nature" or "we're vegan now" {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
nope plants op looks like ill be jungling my zyra to plat in season 7 XD
Cant wait to see how they fuck up the jungle this time v.v
From the sounds of it, you'll have other random people running around the jungle now (likely on both teams), so won't just be the enemy jungler trying to counter jungle you.
My favorite hobby as Soraka is to let my team teamfight while I go take the enemy jungle... the enemy will never expect them to be missing their raptors o.O
Implying your team doesn't already counterjungle you.
Get rid of runes
Or just make them free. as a new player runes/rune pages are gonna be the biggest grind I'll have to deal with :(. Especially for champs that like CDR runes....
they make tier 2 runes 1 ip each for new players. It is very easy.
That only delays the grind, it doesn't remove it at all. Those players are still gonna need tier 3 runes eventually.

Nope no need. just make tier 3 runes the only runes in the game, why make it more confusing than it has to be for new players? There is no need for tiers, that's an extremely outdated model, and mainly was just an ip sink. All they have to do is remove the other tiers, make tier 3 the only runes and give them out for free.

I believe I had seen on boards that they were planning on reworking the runes system entirely... It was in the post on Nexus yesterday as well. http://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/2016/10/dev-on-depth-vs-accessibility/
Is it just me or do none of these changes really sound good?

It isn't as if this is everything (or even these specific things actually fully detailed).


- Support items they didn't go into detail or specifics about
- Jungle plants that while it sounds lame to me, they didn't give details on
- We will have the assassin update still coming
- We have a whole new client incoming
- Fix to masteries people have been complaining about all season
- Fix to camps they again, didn't go into detail about

I think it is less it sounds bad or "not good" and more so, they gave little to no detail, and this announcement felt like a tease for no good reason when they could have waited two weeks and gave us real details.

Assuming they don't fuck up, I'm not sure how new masteries and improvements to old masteries can be a bad thing. If nothing else it's more options.

I think the support item changes sound fantastic too but I can see how someone would be worried about losing Aegis I guess. Jungle changes I am iffy on.
5 bans?
Soon™

What are these plants going to do? Are they going to spawn and just be an extra camp for players? Or are these plants going to spawn with random buffs attached to them, where you don't have to smite but you still get the buff? (like vision/poison/minion stun) I'm confused about how these plants will interact.
The details are unknown, but one thing that **is** known is that all the people who went up in arms to complain about 4 dragons are getting reinvited for season 7. Yay.

It's a game people play professionally. The idea that you can stop people "solving" it is ludicrous. You should just take that idea, put it in a bin and light it on fire. Then take that bin and put it in a dumpster and light that on fire. Then fire that dumpster into the sun.

(This is a rant, i tried to be as clear/sincere as possible) Can i just say, instead of working on junglers AGAIN. How about revisioning the champions that CANNOT see play due to the current state of the game (popular champions mainly). There's so many champions in League that aren't playable anymore at a higher level of elo. It's either META or LOSE now in D5+ [So lower may or may not understand]. Here are examples of popular champions that just simply cannot and probably will not see popular play again due to the fact that EVERYONE 100-0's them including supports "like" karma/brand/alistar - **Vayne** not only is she fun to play, but has a large mechanical incline, however EVERY ADC can do her job in the early game as well as the late game JUST AS WELL. Not only that, but playing a mechanically inclined champion LIKE vayne means you have to provide skill/timing(dodging/when to Q)/structures and cooldowns. Needless to say, with the new marksman items she is just 100% garbage. **Zed** Man, not only do people HATE playing against this champion, because he's "slippery, 1 shots too op" BUT he's just NOT that good. It's just like i stated on Vayne, he is a champion that has a high incline of mastery to be incredible at but you guys(riot) have put a cap on him with the extended nerfs, how EVERYONE can 1 shot now, even the easiest of champions. Players should be REWARDED when playing a highly skilled champion and doing WELL on that champion. Not a slap to the face when realistically Ekko, viktor, syndra etc ALL have better teamfight, burst, wave control, denial, and kill potential as a Zed in every point of the game except 6.**Azir** you guys took an entire 2 years to create a beautiful champion, yet you hide him away and create champions like Auru Sol that didn't let you think at all ENTIRELY. You guys had such a great overlay and idea on what you think you wanted this champion to be, and I had AMAZING hopes, yet we got stuck with that instead of this(http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/d/d5/AoShin_Concept.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20130908110634) Azir was a beautiful creation that has been stripped and overtaken by EVERYMID LANER. including urgot. He was a champion that had a academically higher skill cap and players USED to get rewarded highly. But now shurima sits to rust. **Orianna** A champion that's been loved and hated by every player in League of legends that understands a WOMBOOO COMBOO. This champion not only brought teams together in champion select, but the ability to turn the tides of a teamfight back in Season 3-5 and that ALONE speaks VOLUMES. Orianna is nothing more than a tin can that gets worked over by champions, again, with EVERYTHING in their kits out classing. She's a high skill capped champion but requires a team, surviving laning (WHICH IS HUGE, her mana costs are outrageous, even with a full build) Syndra can get at least 6 combos and still have half mana compared to Orianna. Control mages? Please Balance this. At the end of the day here, people are going to be salty about this post. I'm a veteran to League of legends and i'm not prepared to see the direction it's heading in. One too many settle changes (change can be good, and i'm open to it ALWAYS) but a new champion every month, with 1 meta shift in 5 months, broken champions aren't being fixed, but people complain when someones "OP" but EVERY CHAMPION around them including THEMSELVES are "OP". It makes a lot of champions un-stable and League is becoming 1 trick pony status with Annie/Master yi/graves. How does 1 outplay a graves that's lost his cigar. The game is in complete chaos (the Solo Q side). I understand that this is a team game and I should play friends, but not all of us have that necessity due to daily lives. League of legends ranked/balancing is unstable, and veterans like myself, I believe, can relate to it in someway. Things aren't right when every champion can 100-0, it's a way of balancing but at the same time causation because champions like ^ (stated above) just DONT do that game, I could list off plenty more champions - Kassadin, Xerath, TF, Kalista, Karthus and so on. These champions have always been and always will be the "Omg he's a Legend on ___". INSTEAD we get, oh, it's a graves/syndra/rumble/kennen/zac. The only Champion that has seen ANY kind of love is Lee sin and he rightfully deserves it. Worlds has been nothing more than a disappointment on so many levels. All of these crap teams are able to compete with these amazing teams BECAUSE everything is busted and easy peasy imo, games are lost in champion select and that should NEVER be an ending to a game. Times running out, Overwatch is catching up, I hate that game. PLEEEASSEE, GIVE ME SOMETHING TO LIVE FOR RITO.

{{summoner:3}} That was a long read. Well you are not alone my friend, 3 years here and S6 has been one hell of a ride, i went from playing 5 games a day to 1 per 2 weeks lol. I refuse to play and learn what everyone wants me to do. I have my own playstyle, and i should be free to express that through my champion picks. #Teemogod.
I guess we will finally be seeing more than just TLD being used with this update?

tbh I don't see thunderlords used nearly as much as it was preseason. Its situationally used and its used like intended on particular burst champions instead of literally everyone on the team including soraka. 

If any TLD is finally the way it belongs. 

Plus the update isn't for keystone masteries, its for regular masteries being added (think assassin and exposed weakness added, they're going to just add all the rest in this update.)

What? Strength is being used by nearly every Jungler, Fervor and Warlords by ADCs, Grasp and Fervor by Top Laners, Windspeaker's and Bond by Supports, and a mix of Thunderlord's Deathfire and Surge on Mid Laners.
R.I.P Locket of the Iron Solari.
I'm willing to bet Locket will exist but for its active component rather than its passive.
so when are we getting rid of runes?

Noo, I love my runes ; ^; 
Movement speed quints on an ADC 
Attack Damage marks on mages 

i need my runes man TT~TT
Q_Q No please not my aegis!{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
I'll wait until the new supportive tanky items get revealed to start panicking. For now, I'll assume that a more interesting alternative to Aegis will be made.
